Note: if possible, they should be allocated between the taxa - bostaur and bosprim, according to the ratio of definitely domestic (bostaur) and wild (bosprim) specimens in each phase/assemblage
if possible, they should be allocated between the taxa - canifam and canilup, according to the ratio of definitely domestic (canifam) and wild (canilup) specimens in each phase/assemblage
these taxa should be grouped under one taxon - caprawild (Capra wild species)
caprawild= capraeg+capribe+caprpyr
these taxa should be grouped under one taxon - equuspe (Equus species - all wild/domestic species)
equuspe= equuasi+equucab+equufer+equuhem+equuhyd+equuspe
these taxa should be grouped under one taxon - erinspe
erinspe= erincon+erineur+erinrou+erinspe
these taxa should be grouped under one taxon - felispe (however, felicat was only found in two sites (intrusive in one), and given the chronological framework all felispe should be wild)
felispe= felicat+felispe+felisil
these taxa should be grouped under one taxon - gazespe
gazespe= gazegaz+gazespe+gazesub
these taxa should be grouped under one taxon - lepuspe
lepuspe= lepucap+lepueur+lepuspe+leputim+leputol
these taxa should be grouped under one taxon - lynxspe
lynxspe= lynxlyn+lynxpar+lynxspe
these taxa should be grouped under one taxon - martspe (Martes species)
martspe= martfoi+martmar+martspe+martzib
these taxa should be grouped under one taxon - mustspe (Mustela species)
mustspe= musterm+musteve+mustlut+mustniv+mustput+mustspe+putoput+putospe
these taxa should be grouped under one taxon - oviswild (Ovis wild species)
oviswild= ovisamm+ovismus
these taxa should be grouped under one taxon - oviscap (Ovis/Capra)
oviscap= caprhir+ovisari+oviscap
these taxa should be grouped under one taxon - pantspe (Panthera species)
pantspe= pantleo+pantpar
if possible, they should be allocated between the taxa - susscrd and susscrf, according to the ratio of definitely domestic (susscrd) and wild (susscrf) specimens in each phase/assemblage
these taxa should be grouped under one taxon - ursuarc (there are only two bones from two sites identified as ursuspe) (Ursus species)
ursuarc= ursuspe+ursuarc
these taxa should be grouped under one taxon - vulpspe (Vulpes species)
vulpspe= vulpcor+vulpspe+vulpvul
